title: OSHO_GEETA DARSHAN 218 1971 amr-Hindi audios
description:
Here are "GEETA DARSHAN" complete audio discourse series in AMR format audio which can be played on VLC player and some other.
Sound quality is good as it could be with these old recordings from 1971..
Here is list of 18 folders, probably corresponding to 18 Chapters of "Bhagavad Gita" and each folder contains files as Osho was talking.On the beginning of discourse Ma Taru is chanting original verse from "Bhagavad Gita" about which was Osho giving discourse.
Unfortunatelly all Geeta darshan is not translated or published to English even after 45 years. Thank you to swami who was transliterating audio to Hindi text. This was not easy task either.
(ADHYAYA is probably some private marking of folders on someones HD. I got this thanks to one kind O-sannyasin in Madhavpur.

   A:OSHO HINDITALKSOSHO_GEETA DARSHAN 218 1971 amr-Hindi audios

      _ADHYAYA 01 & 02 AHMEDABAD NOV 1970
      _ADHYAYA 03
      _ADHYAYA 04 MUMBAI JAN 1971
      _ADHYAYA 05 MUMBAI MAR 1971
      _ADHYAYA 06 AHMEDABAD MAY 1971
      _ADHYAYA 07 AHMEDABAD MAY 1971
      _ADHYAYA 08 AHMEDABAD SEPT 1971
      _ADHYAYA 09 AHMEDABAD NOV 1971
      _ADHYAYA 10 AHMEDABAD DEC 1971
      _ADHYAYA 11 MUMBAI DEC 1972
      _ADHYAYA 12 1972
      _ADHYAYA 13 1972
      _ADHYAYA 14 1972
      _ADHYAYA 15 PUNE MAR 1974
      _ADHYAYA 16 PUNE APR 1974
      _ADHYAYA 17 PUNE MAY 1975
      _ADHYAYA 18 PUNE AUG 1975
